segue_the_chain: Dreaming happens at night, so to the album Midnight Marauders and this track from it…

segue_dave.line: D:Ream started being a band in 1990, while The Clash's "Death or Glory" was released by CBS, a record label which dissolved in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: D:Ream started being a band in 1990 and The Clash's "London Calling" was released by CBS, a record label that stop existing in the same year.
